utils (package)
==============================

Utility functions for thermal_history

Submodules
----------

optimised\_funcs (module)
----------------------------------------------

Jit compiled replacements for numpy.linspace, numpy.polyval, scipy.integrate.cumulative_trapezoid

.. automodule:: thermal_history.utils.optimised_funcs
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

utilities (module)
---------------------------------------

Further utility functions for checking parameters.

.. automodule:: thermal_history.utils.utilities
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
